gameDetails.name: Pax Hispanica: Promo 1 â€“ Conquistadores
gameDetails.description:
Expand your Pax Hispanica experience with the Prequel Pack of 14 cards, introducing a fresh scenario set a century earlier during the Age of Discovery, starting in 1498. Explore the uncharted Caribbean as you navigate the early days of exploration and conquest.

It includes 14 cards & 10 chits. These new cards replace the original Haven Cards in the base game and bring additional historical depth and strategic options to your gameplay.
